sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Row, Col, Button, Form, InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Trash, PlusLg, XCircleFill } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Formik, FieldArray } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; const schema = Yup.object().shape({ code: Yup.string().required('Product code is missing.'), title: Yup.string().required('Product title is missing.'), sku: Yup.array().of( Yup.object().shape({ itemName: Yup.string().required('Item name is missing.'), price: Yup.number().min(0).required('Price is missing'), inStock: Yup.number().min(0).required('Stock number is missing.'), discount: Yup.number().min(0).max(100).required('Discount value is missing') }) ).required('Items is missing') }) const ProductForm = (props) => { return ( { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }} > { ({ values, errors, touched, handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur, resetForm, setFieldValue }) => (
Code {errors.code} Category Product Title Cover Image URL Product Description {`Remaining Characters: ${500 - values.description.length}`}
(

Items (Max 5 items)

{ values.sku.length > 0 && values.sku.map((item, index) => (
Item {index + 1}
Item Title Image URL Price Unit Discount %Off In Stock
)) }
) } />
) } ) } export default ProductForm;
